title: Brazilian Indigenous chief demands greater role in climate debate
description: Chief Raoni Metuktire, a well-known leader from the Amazon, calls for removal of 'invaders' from Indigenous territory.

title: What can Russia offer Africa?
description: Vladimir Putin is hosting leaders from the continent, promising aid and lashing out at the West.

title: Musk says X monthly users reach ‘new high’
description: This is the latest in series of comments from X's executives claiming strong traction in usage after launch of Threads.

title: Top Senegalese opposition leader Ousmane Sonko arrested: Lawyer
description: The firebrand politician and presidential candidate has faced a number of legal woes in recent years.

title: Putin promises grains, debt write-off as Russia seeks Africa allies
description: Putin pledges to supply Africa with grain, promotes joint fight against 'neocolonialism' during Russia-Africa summit.

title: US lawmakers urge Biden to withhold more military aid to Egypt
description: Group of US senators call on Biden administration to withhold $320m in aid over Egypt's 'deteriorating' rights record.

title: US called Niger a ‘model of resilience’. Now it is grappling with a coup
description: Military takeover comes just months after top US diplomat hailed Niger's significance to Washington in historic visit.

title: Moscow says Ukraine fired missiles at Russian city, wounding 20
description: Moscow accuses Kyiv of firing missiles and wounding 20 people as Russia pounds a key front line in southern Ukraine.

title: Israel’s US visa waiver push draws anger among Palestinian Americans
description: Visa-free travel for Israelis to US would 'reward' Israel for decades of abuse against US citizens, advocates say.

title: ‘He didn’t want to die’: Mourning Palestinian teenager Faris Abu Samra
description: Relatives of 14-year-old who was shot and killed by Israeli forces in the occupied West Bank say he was 'loved dearly'.

title: In first, scientists induce ‘virgin birth’ in female fruit flies
description: Genetically manipulated females went on to reproduce without a male partner in a new study.

title: Trump denies wrongdoing after new charges filed in secret documents case
description: Former US president faces new allegations he moved to destroy security footage requested by the Department of Justice.

title: G20 environment meeting ends without agreement on climate crisis
description: No consensus reached on several key points, including curbing emissions, despite record-breaking temperatures.

title: Biden orders changes to how US military handles sexual assault cases
description: Reforms mark the most sweeping change to the US military legal code since its creation in 1950, the White House says.

title: In war and peace, the oud never leaves this Syrian musician’s side
description: Hassan Hamza preserves the craft of making the musical instrument in a country that has seen more than a decade of war.

title: Canada women footballers reach interim pay deal, but say fight ‘isn’t over’
description: Players say they are 'deeply disappointed' to lack long-term deal, but want to focus on football as World Cup continues.

title: US orders non-emergency personnel to leave violence-hit Haiti
description: Kidnapping and violent crimes are widespread, State Department says in latest travel advisory for Caribbean nation.

title: Vietnam jails former officials and diplomats in mass bribery trial
description: More than 50 people are found guilty of corruption charges over repatriation flights during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: US stands against China’s ‘bullying’ behaviour, Pentagon chief says
description: Lloyd Austin's comments come at start of bilateral talks in Australia on defence, countering China in Asia-Pacific.

title: Is it time for the West to double down on the Ukraine war?
description: A former US defence secretary says that it’s time to support Ukraine more strongly and get out of 'never-never land'.

title: Russia’s Wagner boss appears to hail Niger coup, tout services
description: Despite having led an armed mutiny in Russia last month, the mercenary boss has been seen at a summit in St Petersburg.

title: England beat Denmark to stand on verge of Women’s World Cup last-16
description: James scored the only goal of the game in a second 1-0 win for England.

title: Niger general Tchiani named head of transitional government after coup
description: Niger's new leader, Tchiani was head of the presidential guard unit from 2015 till Wednesday's ouster of Bazoum.

title: Hong Kong court rejects gov’t request to ban popular protest song
description: Judge says banning 2019 mass protest song Glory to Hong Kong would have 'chilling effects' on freedom of expression.

title: ‘Outlaws’: Morocco’s Rif provides refuge for cannabis farmers
description: Even as Morocco liberalises some cannabis laws, the Rif continues to be a centre for illicit production.

title: Despite anti-coup rhetoric, can the West exit Niger, its latest Sahel hub?
description: As the world condemns the coup in Niger, analysts say the West still needs a presence there for an eye on the Sahel.

title: Power impasse continues in Niger, 48 hours after coup against Bazoum
description: Two days after mutinous soldiers announced a coup against Bazoum, uncertainty remains about who is in charge.

title: Rights groups, opposition slam proposed cyber crime law in Jordan
description: The government says law will punish online attackers, but critics fear it will expand state control over social media.

title: South Africa’s controversial ‘race quota’ law stirs debate
description: Decades after the end of apartheid, ​​severe inequality persists with almost half of Black South Africans unemployed.

title: China’s missing minister: Qin Gang’s gone, but Xi Jinping looks weaker too
description: Qin Gang's mysterious removal and disappearance is unsettling for China's elite politics and Xi's image of 'stability'

title: Heavy rain, gusts as Typhoon Doksuri makes China landfall
description: Doksuri, the second typhoon to make landfall in China in less than two weeks, will move north.

title: Singapore executes first woman in nearly 20 years over 31 grams of heroin
description: Saridewi Binte Djamani hanged despite outcry from rights groups including Amnesty International.

title: Saudi Arabia summons Denmark’s charge d’affaires over Quran burnings
description: The kingdom calls for a halt to 'disgraceful acts' after spate of Quran burnings in Copenhagen.

title: North Korea’s Kim displays nuclear-capable missiles, drones at parade
description: 'Victory Day' parade in Pyongyang features Hwasong-18 intercontinental ballistic missiles and attack drones.

title: Biden meets Italy’s Meloni to talk China, Ukraine
description: White House downplays differences over China and LGBTQ rights as the two sides pledge to cooperate on Ukraine.

title: White House adviser Jake Sullivan meets Saudi crown prince for Jeddah talks
description: The White House said the talks focused on efforts for a 'more peaceful, secure, prosperous and stable Middle East'.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 520
description: These are the main developments as the Russian invasion of Ukraine enters its 520th day.
